entry.title: FB60 Duplicate invoices are not checked anymore
entry.content:
Hello experts,

In my system S4, FB60 Duplicate invoices are not checked anymore. before the check was working fine.

Now I checked, if the fields relevants for this check have been updated or changer, but it seems that there no way to change them, it's the standard behavior of SAP :

If the Reference Document Number field (BKPF-XBLNR) is filled up the following fields will be checked to idnetify duplicate invoices:

  • Company Code(BUKRS)
  • Vendor(LIFNR)
  • Currency(WAERS)
  • Invoice/Document Date(BLDAT)
  • Reference document number(XBLNR)

If the Reference Document Number field (BKPF-XBLNR) is not filled up the following fields will be checked to idnetify duplicate invoices:

  • Company Code(BUKRS)
  • Vendor(LIFNR)
  • Currency(WAERS)
  • Invoice/Document Date(BLDAT)
  • Amount in document currency(WRBTR)

Can you please confirm this ?

Now, what other points can I check ?

May be make a debug with a developer to make to check if there is a specific ABAP that bypass this check ?

 

Thank you for your help

Regards,

entry.title: subcontracting with rm sold and invoiced
entry.content:
Hi,

I have a case where our company produces flour. We are sub-contracting pasta making to a supplier where he will be using our flour but due to regulation, we have to issue an invoice for the quantity of flour to be used for pasta production.

in SAP, the subcontracting PO process consider transferring the flour to the supplier without issuing any invoice (flour will still be  owned by our company). 

Also, this same supplier is also a customer that is buying flour for his own consumption.

My questions are:

1- how to process a subcontracting PO where part of the BoM (flour) is sold and invoiced? is it possible?

2- in order to differentiate the customer from supplier, we consider creating another BP number for the same customer name but defined as customer and supplier in order to track the sold flour and the purchased finished good (pasta). Does this make sense?

3- From accounting perspective, how should I treat the transactions (POs and invoices, payments...), shoudl I create different GL accounts for the different BP numbers?

Appreciate your help on this

entry.title: Group Reporting: Update old data in ACDOCA
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are currently configuring Group Reporting in a rise Private edition landscape; however, the configuration of the consolidation unit, consolidation chart of accounts, FS item, subitem category, etc., was done after the go-live. As a result, the existing or previously posted items in ACDOCA are not Containing these fields.

Is there any way or program that can be executed to update the posted data with these fields and derive the group reporting information to the line items, so we can observe how the data is reflected in the Data Monitor step, for example?

Thanks in advance, Dears.

entry.title: SPAIN SII REVERSAL
entry.content:
Hi Team,                                                     

I am writing to know about the SPAIN SII Reversal process for SAP S4 Hana 2020 Version                                                  

1.Initially i am not using integration suite and trying to manually download XML and send it to the tax agencies so My Spain SII Documents have status of only created and Included in lists  and for Spain SII Lists always have created                                                  

2.Now my concerns  are                                                  

A.If i want to reverse the customer DR document i need to adjust as cancel document in the Spain SII Lists (edoc_Cockpit)                                         

B.When i run the ESSI_Edoccreate its creating 1 Outgoing inv for DA document type which is reversal                                                       

But when checked in EDOC_COCKPIT in the view of Reversal documents it shows as cancelled and in view of SII documents also cancelled                                                       

                                                         

3.As both views are cancelled i am not able to create New XML in while running the ESSI_edoclists resulting as 0 Documents created                                                                           

I understand that in view of Spain SII Lists it should be shown as created .(Creating eDocuments From Reversal Documents | SAP Help Portal) but reversal FB08 Wont accept unless its shows as cancelled.                                                                             

Can you please help me on clarifying this SAP Document and Reporting Compliance SAP S/4HANA Finance

entry.title: Budget is returned to available during the GR posting for PO's with acc assig “A” (Asset)
entry.content:
Dear Experts

We are Facing an issue when posting the Goods Receipt (GR) for purchase orders with account assignment type “A” (Asset). Upon posting via Movement Type 101, the system releases the committed and assigned budget back to availability. This behavior enables users to create additional purchase orders under the same WBS element using the same budget potentially without restriction.

The issue is that the system does not capture the WBS element already assigned to the asset during the GR posting. As a result, no CO document is generated, and the budget control mechanism fails to consume the allocated funds.

Notably:

  • Cost Element Category 90 is active.
  • The G/L Account linked to the relevant asset class has the “Record Account Assignment” field enabled in Transaction Code FS00.
  • The account assignment objects in Asset Accounting are maintained via Transaction Code ACSET.

Despite these configurations, the system fails to derive the WBS element during the initial GR posting Movement Type 101

However, when the GR is reversed using Movement Type 102, the system correctly captures the WBS element, generates the corresponding CO document, and transfers the budget to the actuals with a negative value indicating that the integration logic functions correctly in reversal scenarios.

Thank you advance

Best Regard

entry.title: Reversed document from FB08 can be reverse again via FBRA
entry.content:

After Execute, The reverse document 5100000001 was reverse by document 5100000002 that reversed document and 'Reverse with' in document 5080000001 was change from 5100000001 to blank.

Why? and Can I resolve this problem?

entry.title: KO88 doesn't settle down payment to ASSET UNDER CONSTRUCTION
entry.content:
When executing KO88, SAP does not consider the down payment. Instead, it settles the full PO invoice amount to the asset, without deducting the down payment as expected.

I have already verified in OKO7, and the down payment is correctly flagged there.
